title: D4IS Solutions
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: d4is_solutions
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with D4IS Solutions. The average
  contract duration was 2.47 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $940.9K. The longest
  contract was 5.02 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.7M.
lookup_name: 'D4IS SOLUTIONS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '4.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '19'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '58%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '150%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.09'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '4.1M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.47'
s421_mean_contract_value: '940.9K'
s425_max_duration: '5.02'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.7M'
---
